xtc.lang.cpp

Class HeaderFileManager.PFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.Include
      • xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.PFile
  • Enclosing class:
    HeaderFileManager

    public class HeaderFileManager.PFile
extends HeaderFileManager.Include
    A struct to encapsulate the data associated with a regular header.
